item.title: One Incredible Stephen King Story Benefited From Taking More Than 40 Years To Write
item.description: One great Stephen King story from You Like It Darker was decades in the making, but that gestation period benefited the novella in the end.

item.title: Rocky's Most Underrated Movie Is Why I'm Fine With Sylvester Stallone Not Being In Creed 4
item.description: Sylvester Stallone is unlikely to appear in Creed 4, but I am okay with this thanks to perhaps the most underrated movie in the Rocky series.

item.title: One Year Before Christopher Nolan's The Odyssey, Watch Ralph Fiennes' Version From 2024 That's Now On Streaming
item.description: Christopher Nolan's Odyssey may be getting all the attention, but a year before its release, Ralph Fiennes has another version already available.
